function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient state policies related to housing strategies in response to COVID-19","Impact":"Inadequate response to the pandemic, increased risk of transmission in housing environments","Mitigation":"Engage in policy development for effective housing strategies, prioritize public health in housing policies","Technologies":"Policy development tools for housing strategies, data analysis for identifying high-risk areas","People":"Residents of housing environments, policymakers, public health authorities","Owner":"Government authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate lighting and ventilation in residential environments","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission of contagious diseases, compromised public health","Mitigation":"Improve lighting and ventilation in residential buildings, prioritize natural ventilation in common areas","Technologies":"HVAC systems, natural ventilation systems, building materials for enhanced lighting","People":"Residents of housing environments, building owners, architects","Owner":"Building owners, architects, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Social isolation leading to risks of anxiety, depression, and premature mortality","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health, increased risk of premature mortality","Mitigation":"Promote outdoor and social activities within safe guidelines, provide mental health support services","Technologies":"Virtual social platforms, mental health support apps, community engagement tools","People":"Residents of housing environments, mental health professionals, community leaders","Owner":"Local community organizations, mental health organizations"}]}
